DOC.criteria: The sample consist Filipino parent grandparent children/grandchildren age 612 year old . Inclusion criterion include : 1. parent grandparent least one child 6 12 year age 2. participate parent/grandparent Filipino 3 . At least one parent/grandparent willing complete pre post survey watch brief video 4. parent/grandparent age 18 old 5 . English fluency 1 . Younger 18 year age 2 . Does speak English 3 . Target child developmental disability Trisomy 21 autism 4 . Parent grandparent plan move area within next nine month
